column4: Can any of you guys recommend a good instant messenger client that i can use with the msn messenger protocol (and icq if possible, but not important) where i can see the ip of the people i have on my list?
GAIM
kopete also supports icq aim msn iirc
i'm using gaim right now, but i cannot see the ip of the people who are on my list? Or am i just not looking hard enough?
i dont know about that i dont use instant messaging . Im an irc kinda guy
there is also Trillian but i dont know if it supports Linux
does trillian have the ability to look up the ip of the people on my list?
i'm sorry for bothering you again, but i never got an answer. If i use trillian, can i see the ip of the people on my msn list?
np bother and I am not certain but it isnt open source and will have to pay for the full version and it is windows only
aww, thats harsh. I could live with closed source and windows only, but i can't get myself to pay for an IM client. Thanks though
give kopete a try: sudo apt-get install kopete
/server irc.newnetwork.com PORT#
great, thanks
but now that i have actually bought the song, i should be able to play it. There must be some way to get rid of DRM? I've heard something about "fair2use" ?
I dont know about that or how to remove the DRM. sorry :/
I hear ya but we cannot help you circumvent the law
but what we say can unintentioanly put someone else in jail or even us
as i said, i believe it is legal in my country to remove drm, so no harm should be done by that
it is illegal in my country and I will not help you . sorry
i'm sorry, i left a bit early, didnt manage to read your reply. Mind pasting it again?
it is offtopic and I am bored with the subject. my answer is NO
